articles.title: Cashing In On Content Marketing - How to Rank Your Content Faster
articles.description:
Getting your content to rank faster might seem difficult, but all it really takes is a little extra effort and work beyond the usual keyword research and optimization.

Patrick Stox, product adviser, technical SEO, and brand ambassador for Ahrefs, joins me to…
